name: Infinite Space Invader
description:
Defend against spaceships in this endless space invader game! Upon dying, you'll restart as the ship that defeated you.

Controls
Movement: WASD/Arrows
Target: Mouse
Shoot: Hold down left mouse button

Due to the time limit these features were not included:

  • Musik & SFX
  • Point system
  • Ending
  • Slowmotion when you die (making it obvious that you change to the killer)
  • Camera shake
